parameters.name: Indent
parameters.description: Indentation of lines other than the first line

parameters.name: IndentIncrement
parameters.description: Amount by which to increment the current indents

title: IParagraphs.GetIndentation
description: Gets the indentation of the current paragraph.
signature:
System.Boolean GetIndentation( 
   out System.Double
FirstlineIndent
,
   out System.Double
Indent
,
   out System.Double
IndentIncrement
)

parameters.name: Indent
parameters.description: Indentation of lines other than the first line

parameters.name: IndentIncrement
parameters.description: Amount by which to increment the current indents

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, set the current paragraph using
IParagraphs::CurrentParagraph
.
